thread.section_title: Vision Direct Australia Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Vision Direct Australia | www.visiondirect.com.au
thread.title: Mr disappointed
thread.title_full: Vision Direct Australia reviewed by Mr disappointed

author: Mr disappointed
title: Mr disappointed
text: Vision direct are a farce! The advertised the sunglasses I ordered and psi for but were unable to source find or deliver the item I wanted. They continues to advertise the same pair despite being unable to deliver. Do not believe their slick hype and invenantory! They are unlikely to hold the stock they sell. Very disappointing. I will be going elsewhere for sure!
